title: # 419 - Joe Buck, Oliver Hudson & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with NFL Sportscaster Joe Buck and Actor Oliver Hudson. We talk about what it was like to have super famous parents, getting arrested, The NFL, how they are handling quarantine, and much more! 

Check out Joe and Oliver’s Podcast “Daddy Issues” wherever you get yours! 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today and get your first month free. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Check out this week’s menu and get thirty dollars off across your first two deliveries when you visit http://www.Blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
